title: vivo T1 5G (Rainbow Fantasy, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Type-C to USB Cable, USB Power Adapter, Sim Eject Tool, Protective Case, Protective Film (Applied), Documentation
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: 850/900/1800, 3G WCDMA: B1/B5/B8, 4G FDD-LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G TDD- LTE: B38/B40/B41 (120 M), 5G NR_NSA: n77/n78
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 50MP (f/1.8 Aperture) + 2MP (f/2.4 Aperture) + 2MP (f/2.4 Aperture), Camera Feature: Photo, Portrait, Video, Pano, Live Photo, Slow Motion, Time-Lapse, Pro, AR Stickers, Documents
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, E-compass, Side Fingerprint Sensor, Gyroscope
product_specification.Other Features: 6 GB + 2 GB Extended RAM, Dual 4G, Dual 5G, Google Services (Google Assistant, Google Files, Gmail, Maps, YouTube, Drive, YT Music, Play Movies, Duo, Photos, Contacts, Google Calendar, Google One, Google Pay, Podcasts, Lens, Google News, Doc, Sheet, Slide, Google Home), 18W Fast Charging, Plastic Handset Material
product_specification.Audio Formats: WAV, MP3, MP2, MIDI, Vorbis, APE, FLAC

product_description.Robust Performance: Reap the benefits of powerful and seamless performance at every turn, as this Vivo TI 5G, mobile phone is powered by an Octa-core Snapdragon 695 processor that utilises the 6 nm 5G production process. Also, this processor comes with an integrated CPU with a clock speed of up to 2.2 GHz so that you can get high-speed performance on this phone.
product_description.Multi-layer Cooling System: Indulge in playing intensive video games over the weekend without worrying about your phone getting heated up. This mobile features an innovative Turbo 5 layer of liquid cooling technology that helps to keep the temperature low, thereby offering a cool gaming experience.
product_description.Liberating Battery Life: Boasting a 5000 mAh battery this Vivo smartphone has all the power to keep you running throughout without worrying about the battery running out. Also, this mobile phone is equipped with an 18 W Fast charging cable that allows you to power up your battery as soon as you run out of juice. Moreover, this phone comes with reverse charging using an OTG cable so that you can use your phone as a power bank.
product_description.Vivid and Vibrant Display: The Vivo smartphone features a 16.72 cm (6.58) FHD+ in-cell display that lets you see over a billion shades of vibrant colours with clear details. Also, this mobile phone comes with a supported refresh rate of up to 120 Hz so that you get to enjoy smooth visuals while streaming your favourite videos and games on this smartphone.
product_description.Slim and Stunning Design: Featuring a 2.5D flat frame on an 8.25 mm thin body, this smartphone offers an elegant look, thus keeping you out of the crowd. Also, it features a lightweight design to make it convenient and comfortable for you to carry around.
product_description.Capture Fascinating Photos: This smartphone comes with a 50 MP Main Camera and a powerful sensor so that you can capture clear, sharp, and bright photos even during dimly-lit conditions.
product_description.Clear Images with Super Night Mode: When your camera flash is unable to light up the exotic beauty of nature during the night, enjoy illuminating your photos and videos with the Super Night Mode. This Super Night mode comes equipped with noise reduction technology and frame merging algorithms that allow you to capture high resolution and clear images of the night environment on your phone.
product_description.Portrait Bokeh Camera: Thanks to the Portrait Bokeh Algorithm, you can enjoy capturing sharp photos with rich contrasts effortlessly.
product_description.Expanded RAM 2.0: This smartphone is equipped with an extended RAM 2.0 that allows you to enjoy up to 6 GB of internal memory, as extended RAM to seamlessly shuffle between multiple apps.

Overall the phone is a good purchase..I want to mention the stuff i like about this phone and something which i dont like or missing in this device...first of all i Start with the good things
Pros:
*Great battery life
*Decent rear camera setup
*Great In hand feel
*Side mount Fingerprint sensor
*Selfie night mode
*Good gaming experience
*Runs on Android 12

Cons:
*Missing Wide/ultra wide cameras
*Amoled Panel should have been there
*Feels bit laggy even in 120 hz refresh rate
*Front cam couldve been better
*Haptic feedback
*Touch feels little hard..

But in this price range it is something which make u feel like ur using mid range flagship..

pros.Performance: Powered by an Octa-core Snapdragon 695 processor, this phone gives fast and seamless performance.
pros.5000 mAh Battery: The 5000 mAh battery ensures that the phone gives a long lasting performance. The 18W fast charger takes just 2 hours to fully charge.
pros.Design: This phone has a stunning design and is lightweight to make it easy to carry around.
pros.16.72 cm (6.58) FHD+ in-cell Display: The 120hz refresh rate and FHD+ display gives an immersive and seamless viewing experience.

cons.Camera: The camera quality is just decent enough. In low light conditions the rear camera performs very poor.
cons.Touch: There are issues with the screen touch. It takes some time to respond. Sometimes back button doesn't respond.

summary.verdict: The vivo T1 5G is a good phone in the mid-range price segment.
summary.Additional Information: Supports Slow-mo camera, Fingerprint scanner, 8.5mm slim phone.
